entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the main character and the one who is leaving the house. He is referred to by name throughout the conversation.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's relatives who have been taking care of him. They are mentioned as a group and their individual names are not specified.

entities.name: dedalus
entities.description: Dedalus is one of the people accompanying Harry to leave the house. He has a bulge in his waistcoat pocket that Uncle Vernon is staring at.

entities.name: hestia
entities.description: Hestia is another person who is accompanying Harry to leave the house. She suggests waiting outside in the hall for the sake of tact.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is one of Harry's relatives and is mentioned as being appalled by something in Dedalus's waistcoat pocket.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is another relative of Harry who is fussily checking the clasp of her coat.

relationships.description: Harry has a family relationship with the Dursleys, as they are his relatives.
Uncle Vernon is staring at Dedalus's waistcoat pocket in a suspicious manner, suggesting that there may be something unusual or incriminating inside.
Hestia is accompanying Harry to leave the house, as mentioned in the conversation.
